response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Considering its worth to you, we propose a special offer of $14,000 for the product. This price reflects its true value while allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. We are confident that this offer will meet both our financial goals and your expectations. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed, please do not hesitate to respond. We look forward to your positive consideration.", "product_price": 14000}
